ScreensMenu - Class in gui.menu
Menu for selecting panels.
ScreensMenu(NKFrame) - Constructor for class gui.menu.ScreensMenu
Creates the menu.
select(List<List<String>>, String) - Method in class object.DataManager
Adds a column to the resulting data.
setDate() - Method in class object.DataManager
Sets all the values of the date to today's date.
setDateField(FieldEnum) - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Sets the date fields for the user to be able to choose dates from.
setField() - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Sets all of the fields by scanning through the enum for the required fields to be mapped, then determine the type of fields that should be mapped to the enum and creates the fields and its listeners if needed.
setInputField(FieldEnum) - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Sets the fields for numerical inputs.
setLocationFilter() - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Creates the drop down menu for the location filter at the users panel, and also adds an action listener to it to make it usable.
setOrderFilter() - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Adds an action listener into the order filter button to make it usable.
setOrderTableName() - Method in class object.DataManager
Sets the order file name to the appropriate name.
setOutputField(FieldEnum) - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Sets the output fields for users to see the results of their selections.
setPanel(PanelEnum, String) - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Changes the panel to a new panel.
setProductField() - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Sets the product field by creating a drop down box containing the name and price information of all available products.
setUserField() - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Sets the user field for the user to be able to select users from.
sort(JTable, int) - Static method in class utility.TableUtility
Sorts the Table.
start() - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Starts the GUI by making a loading screen, make the frame visible, maximize the frame, and set the default close action.
StringUtility - Class in utility
String manipulation utility.
StringUtility() - Constructor for class utility.StringUtility
Private constructor prevents instantiation.
sync() - Method in class gui.frame.NKFrame
Syncs the input and output fields.
